name: ninja_european_capacity_factors
long_description: This data package contains simulated wind and PV capacity factors from Renewables.ninja. License: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0, https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/. References: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.energy.2016.08.060 and https://doi.org/10.1016/j.energy.2016.08.068
